eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Missouri; at 12:44 PM ON JAN 12, 2026 Effective until 01:44 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THE JEFFERSON CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT HAS ISSUED AN AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION THAT OCCURRED AT 1115 EAST MCCARTY STREET ,  JEFFERSON CITY , MISSOURI ON 01/12/2026 AT 12:00 PM.  

ABDUCTED WAS SABA AKBARI, FEMALE, AGE 12. 
ABDUCTED WAS HAJARN AKBARI, MALE, AGE 1. 

SUSPECT VEHICLE is A BLUE 2015 HONDA ODYSSEY BEARING MISSOURI REGISTRATION 'J' 'J' '6','M' '8' 'C'.  
VEHICLE/SUSPECT LAST SEEN WESTBOUND ON U.S. 54 FROM SOUTHWOOD HILLS IN COLE COUNTY. 

SUSPECT is MALANG JAN AKBARI A MALE, 46, 5 FEET 11 INCHES TALL, 182 POUNDS, HAS BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. 

VICTIM HAJARN AKBARI HAS BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. 

ALERT UPDATE: THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN LOCATED AND THE SUSPECT IS IN CUSTODY.  HOWEVER, THE CHILDREN HAVE NOT BEEN LOCATED.
ALERT UPDATED TO INCLUDE A SECOND VICTIM, SABA AKBARI.  THE SUSPECT MURDER THE MOTHER OF THE CHILD AND WAS ARMED WITH A KNIFE.  THE SUSPECT FLED THE SCENE WITH THE VICTIM.  TROOP F. 

PLEASE CALL 9 1 1 OR JEFFERSON CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 573-634-6400 IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THIS ALERT.
